title: Launch button on Patcher does nothing
body:
My League patcher does nothing when i press launch, i hear the sound cue  and it moves but nothing happens..
if i re install it works for the first time running as it should.. but if i close it it never works again, i cant get past the patcher.. 
i have tried most "Fixes" such as deleting solutions folder, and Project folders in RADS, adding Adobe AIR all that all does nothing

replies.body:
Ive been having the same issue with biitdefender, went through an extensive list of fixes with rito, who ended up telling me to see if bitdefender support can help.

they have not given me a solution....
the only thing i can do is uninstall bit defender, then the client works fine.

i can usually log  on to league without uninstalling AV, but it take a few minutes for the log in screen to appear, after i hit the play button. 

After patches is particularly bad, bitdefender stops me being able to accept terms at the end of the patch, so i have to uninstall AV everytime without fail
Uninstalling Bitdefender ACTUALLY fixed my game...
I have the exact same problem.
Have you already tried adding an exception for League of Legends in your firewall(s) and antivirus applications?

Hey there,

it's possible your antivirus software and/or firewall is interfering with the launchers ability to function correctly, please disable your AV/firewall and attempt to launch the game again.

At the moment im using Bitdefender, i tried adding LoL to my exclusions and it still doesent work..
BUT i have had problems with Bitdefender in the past installing my AMD Graphics Drivers where i had to fully uninstall bitdefender for it to work
haven't tried uninstalling my av but i may as a last resort
You shouldn't have a need to uninstall your AV completely, most AV software these days has an option to disable any scanning from within the software itself.
